languages.text: "Какое счастье, что почтенный техножрец столь набожен и премудр!"
"How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"
languages.original_text: "Какое счастье, что почтенный техножрец столь набожен и премудр!"

traits.locale_text: "How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"
"How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"
"How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"
"How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"
"How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"
"How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"

languages.text: «¡Somos muy afortunados de que el venerable tecnosacerdote sea tan piadoso y sabio!».
languages.original_text: "How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Somos muy afortunados de que el venerable tecnosacerdote sea tan piadoso y sabio!».

languages.text: 「技術司祭が信心深く賢い方で、とても幸運だ！」
languages.original_text: "How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"

traits.locale_text: 「技術司祭が信心深く賢い方で、とても幸運だ！」

languages.text: “这艘船上能有这么虔诚、这么机智的技术神甫，我们真走运！”
languages.original_text: "How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"

traits.locale_text: “这艘船上能有这么虔诚、这么机智的技术神甫，我们真走运！”

languages.text: "Welch Glück wir doch haben, dass der ehrwürdige Techpriester so fromm und weise ist!"
languages.original_text: "How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"

traits.locale_text: "Welch Glück wir doch haben, dass der ehrwürdige Techpriester so fromm und weise ist!"

languages.text: « Quelle chance pour nous que le vénérable technoprêtre soit si pieux et si sage ! »
languages.original_text: "How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"

traits.locale_text: « Quelle chance pour nous que le vénérable technoprêtre soit si pieux et si sage ! »

languages.text: "Muhterem Tekno Rahip'in böylesine dindar ve bilge olmasından dolayı ne kadar şanslıyız!"
languages.original_text: "How lucky we are that the venerable Tech-Priest is so pious and wise!"
